participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Alex enjoys deep conversations and is very empathetic.
participant_1.background: i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and energetic, Mia loves to socialize and share her passions with others.
participant_2.background: my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i am rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

content.text: :( you don't want to be my friend
